item.title: Compilers and Interpreters Simplified
item.description: Introduction Ever wondered how the computer understands the code you write? ðŸ¤” I had juniors and students who were struggling to understand this process. Terms such as compilers and interpreters can be scary for people who do not have theoretical background in Computer Science and this can make us procrastinate the learning attempts. You might think that it is okay to not understand as long as you can provide executable code but remember, your goal should not be just delivering a code, it should be delivering the best product.
